movie.title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
movie.description_intro: In part six of the Nightmare on Elm Street series, dream monster Freddy Krueger has finally killed all the children of his hometown, and seeks to escape its confines to hunt fresh prey. To this end, he recruits the aid of his (previously unmentioned) daughter. However, she discovers the demonic origin of her father's powers and meets Dad head-on in a final showdown (originally presented in 3-D).
movie.description_full: In part six of the Nightmare on Elm Street series, dream monster Freddy Krueger has finally killed all the children of his hometown, and seeks to escape its confines to hunt fresh prey. To this end, he recruits the aid of his (previously unmentioned) daughter. However, she discovers the demonic origin of her father's powers and meets Dad head-on in a final showdown (originally presented in 3-D).

movies.title: The Foreigner
movies.summary: The story of humble London businessman Quan (Chan), whose long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love - his teenage daughter - is taken from him in a senseless act of politically-motivated terrorism. In his relentless search for the identity of the terrorists, Quan is forced into a cat- and-mouse conflict with a Irish government official (Brosnan), whose own past may hold clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

movies.title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
movies.title_english: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
movies.title_long: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles (1994)
movies.summary: Against the backdrop of a gloomy San Francisco, the nearly two-century-old vampire, Louis de Pointe du Lac, recounts the unbelievable story of his eternal transformation and a life worse than death to the sceptic reporter, Daniel Molloy. Spanning two hundred years of cruel betrayals, extreme solitude, and unquenched thirst, Louis' grimly fascinating tale pivots around his perpetually regrettable decision to embrace the dictatorship of blood, and, above all, his maker: the seductive blonde aristocrat of death, Lestat de Lioncourt. Is Louis' mystical epic of bloodshed genuine? Is this, indeed, an interview with a vampire?

movies.title: Hunter's Creed
movies.summary: After losing his wife to cancer, Dave Bryant also lost his faith in God. In an effort to lift his spirits, Dave's old church buddies convince him to participate in the hunting show they've always wanted to make together. The group heads to a remote cabin and begins documenting their experiences. Before long, Dave senses a dark presence in the woods he's convinced is stalking him. But the other guys have no idea what he's talking about, and Dave begins to wonder if it's all in his head. The presence continues closing in, eventually bringing Dave face to face with death - and his faith.

movies.title: The Girl from the Song
movies.summary: A young musician travels to Burning Man, a unique event in the middle of the Nevada desert, in an attempt to get back the impetuous girl he has fallen in love with.
movies.description_full: A young musician travels to Burning Man, a unique event in the middle of the Nevada desert, in an attempt to get back the impetuous girl he has fallen in love with.
